name: File Access Guard
description: Enforces path-based file protection with three levels (no_access, read_only, no_delete). Intercepts file tools and bash/exec commands. Deterministic pattern matching via picomatch â€” no ML model, <10ms latency.

configPath.description: Path to protection patterns JSON. Relative to plugin directory or absolute.

failOpen.description: If true, allow access when config is malformed. If false (default), block on config error.

logBlocks.description: Log blocked access attempts to the gateway console.

agentOverrides.description: Per-agent config overrides. Key = agent ID, value = { configPath }. Patterns are merged additively with the base config.

configPath.description: Path to agent-specific protection patterns JSON.
